metadata.title: CVE-2016-3154 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The encoder_contexte_ajax function in ecrire/inc/filtres.php in SPIP 2.xbefore 2.1.19, 3.0.x before 3.0.22, and 3.1.x before 3.1.1 allows remoteattackers to conduct PHP object injection attacks and execute arbitrary PHPcode via a crafted serialized object.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3154` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 3.1.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.1-1').
